channel.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
channel.description:
I've heard of cheezscape, pimpscape, testscape... Which one is good for use? (Give more suggestions) Give me some opinions please... and tell me why it's good and I should use it... Thanks.
-X F U R Y X

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @novalye Novalye
item.description:
@novalye wrote:

F U R Y, Funscap3 source is the best one, but you will have to dosome editing even though hes coming out with a new version of it, you might not need to do any at all!

Glad to hear you’re a bit happier! Did you eat some tacos??? just jking, yah sure, later on, when I post my recruitment topic you can tell my what you’re good at and all that… what I really need is a coder… uber coder, because I have tons of ideas for my server, I just need someone to get r done…

ALSO, I was wondering, does that connection speed affect the lagginess of your server? (I’m pretty sure of the answer… but I’m still asking.) Because I’m a bit poor, and I can’t afford it.

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Aight thanks, so most people, or is it just the same person talking… like project 16 (Which I’ve tried, and it proves satisfying…) I’m going to get serveral more opinions until I get into action on the server… (I’ll be posting recruitment topic, and YOU can have a chance of becoming staff on that server! Lol…)

Thanks…

-X F U R Y X[br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2007, 07:51:26 PM[/size][hr]P.S, Please read my other topic on a problem I encountered, (No-Ip help…) it’ll be appreciated so I can start getting my server up faster…

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“X F U R Y X, post:14, topic:152749”]Oh, I see, so I’ve tried Project 16… I think its pretty good, but it’s similar to everything else except for that it actually has NPCs and shops already set up… but that’s visual difference, so what you’re saying is that, internally, Project 16 is better than the others even though it looks the same (all start in varrock, east bank, empty town… etc…) so what I really want is a server that’s like, desserted, so I can edit everything instead of having to delete things… with good codings but I don’t want any NPCs, because I wanted to add them where I want to.
Thanks.

-X F U R Y X[/quote]

Project 16 is better because it’s much more stable, just because it may have less NPC’s etc, if you actually compare the client.java with something like Cheezscape, you’ll notice a much larger difference.

Read full topic

Thanks.

-X F U R Y X

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

A stable source would be there are probably less chances for it to be crashed, and it would be able to survive a lot more (Like massing, etc). An unstable source would be the exact opposite.

Read full topic

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

What does a stable and unstable source mean exactly?? lol. Then I might get an idea of what I want, you see, that’s why I posted this topic, to get some info that I can use and then decide…

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

If you’re looking for a stable source that comes with pretty good updates, I’d suggest Project 16.

If you’re looking for an extreamly unstable source, that’s nearly all PK I’d suggest Pimpscape.

Specify what pro’s and con’s you’re looking for.

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

K, well, I know, I’m not “that” dumb to ask right away… I guess I’ll have to give some background info, I have dled serveral different source servers and have tried them out, but they all seem to be very similar so I was wondering maybe there’s something inside those servers that are physically visual… so that’s why I am posting this topic and if you don’t like it, you don’t have to spread the diease by kinda, putting them down I guess, but anyways, I JUST wanted to get some info or opinion before I started a server… please post something about the topic not about how this is spam, stupid, etc…
Thanks.

-X F U R Y X

P.S, I’m not trying to get anyone angry but I’m just telling you why I posted this… and if you’re in a bad mood, then take a nap or something, don’t get others started…

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*

item.title: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

[quote=“X F U R Y X, post:4, topic:152749”]Hahaha! Nice one, isn’t this the development and help section? Please stop being impatient, or don’t read reply to it… I have looked, and I’m trying to get “info” with your opinions to decide which base server I should use for my server… :eek:

Keep going please! Thank you.

-X F U R Y X[/quote]

This is what i mean, You getting people to hold you hand and decide a good server for you.

Why not find a server that will suit you, Cause i bet any money that you will do all these in order.

1 - Find a good source, Download it.

2 - Want to add more to the server, So you post a topic on moparscape On how to add this something.

3 - No-one will help you and you will get angry and start flaming people.

4 - You will post another topic like this.

Try finding a server by yourself then see if its suitable for you, Has all the shops you need, All the Killable NPCs you need, Everything you need.
Once you have done that, And it has problems with the source, Then post a topic on this.

Instead of wasting our time, By posting on of the most Noobish/Easy question to answer.

Edit: As you can tell, Im in a bad mood. Sorry, Its just what im thinking about this topic.

Read full topic
item.source: What's a good source/base server? *NOW INCLUDES POLL!*
